New Records: The Texas Rangers won their first World Series in franchise history
Key Match Events: The Texas Rangers beat the Arizona Diamondbacks in Game 5 of the World Series to win the series 4-1
Pre-Game Insights: Both teams snuck into the postseason with wildcard berths
Post-Match Reflections: The Rangers won behind the powerful bat of the series MVP Corey Seager
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Phoenix, Arizona
Others: The segment aired on November 2, 2023, and was discussed on Here & Now with Scott Tong and Evan Grant
